What are the genetic changes related to fragile X-associated primary ovarian insufficiency ?,"Mutations in the FMR1 gene increase a woman's risk of developing FXPOI. The FMR1 gene provides instructions for making a protein called FMRP, which helps regulate the production of other proteins. This protein plays a role in t
